Introduction

Lee Hyun Ho, known professionally as Hyun.O, is a South Korean rapper and actor. He began his entertainment career as a member of the hip-hop boy group D-CRUNCH, which debuted on August 6, 2018, with the single album "0806." Within the group, Hyun.O was recognized for his rapping skills and contributions to choreography. In 2021, he made his acting debut in the web drama "Time To Be Together 1:11,".

Following D-CRUNCH's disbandment on November 9, 2022, Hyun.O signed an exclusive contract with High Season Company to focus on his acting career. Shortly thereafter, he enlisted in the military on February 27, 2023, and was discharged on August 26, 2024.

In November 2023, Hyun.O released the single "Always In My Heart" in collaboration with SoYeon, under the label High Season.
